fi.tuni.blogproject

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.blogproject.Comment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Comment>

    @Entity
public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Comment>
    Class for blog post comments.

    Automatically makes a database table out of this class using hibernate.

    Author:
    Jimi Savola - jimi.savola@tuni.fi
